#summary Use Case: PostAnnouncement
#labels UseCase,Teacher

==UseCases==


= PostAnnouncement =


|| Use Case || PostAnnouncement ||
||Identified || T1 ||
|| Description: || The PostAnnouncement use case models Teacher posting an announcement on VINL. ||
||Actors|| Teacher||
|| Preconditions: || 1. User must be successfully logged in with Teacher privileges via the LogIn use case. ||
||Flow of Events: ||1. The use case starts when Teacher selects Post Announcement.||
||                ||2. Teacher will be asked to select a class from list of options. ||
||                ||2.1 If Teacher selects a class, move on to step 3. ||
||                ||2.2        If Teacher fails to select class, error message will occur reflecting that a class has not been chosen.||
||                ||3. Teacher will be prompted to enter text.||
||                ||3.1 Teacher will enter desired message. ||
||                ||3.2 Teacher will hit Post button. ||
||                ||4. If Teacher failed to enter text, an error message will occur reflecting that text has not been entered. ||
||                ||5. Else, Teacher will receive a message, “Announcement Successfully Posted” ||
||Post Condition:|| 1. The assignment will be available for viewing by the appropriate parties through the ReadAnnouncement use case.||
